question: Indian Institute of Management Lucknow (IIM-L) and this bank ties up for climate awareness.
explanation: YES BANK, India's fifth largest private sector Bank, and Indian Institute of Management Lucknow (IIM-L) are signing a charter to further the common objective of spreading 'Climate Literacy' to achieve sustainable development through shared learning. YES BANK will support IIM-L in updating the 2-year course curriculum in accordance with global standards, along with delivering guest lectures.
